title: CV
text:
Angus is a postdoctoral researcher in the Division of Biophysical Chemistry at the Center for Molecular Protein Sciences (CMPS), Lund University, Sweden.

Current Position(s)

2022-present - Postdoctoral researcher, Akke group

Biophysical Chemistry, Center for Molecular Protein Science, Lund University, Sweden




Previous Position(s)

2019-2022 - Postdoctoral researcher, Bax group

Laboratory of Chemical Physics, National Institutes of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Disease (NIDDK), National Institutes of Health (NIH), U.S.A.




Education

2014-2018 - PhD in Biomolecular NMR, Waltho group

Department of Molecular Biology and Biotechnology (School of Biosciences), Sheffield, U.K.
Prof.¬†Jon Waltho

2011-2014 - BSc in Biochemistry (First Class Honors)

Department of Molecular Biology and Biotechnology (School of Biosciences), Sheffield, U.K.




Awards

2023-2025 - Marie Sk≈Çodowska-Curie Actions Postdoctoral Fellowship (MSCA-PF)
2024-2028 - Swedish Research Council (VR) Starting Grant
